resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108807</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108807</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204418</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Confirming and visualizing Lewis Dot Structures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestätigenund sichtbar machende Lewis 
Punkt-Strukturen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structures de confirmation et de visualisation de 
point de Lewis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estruturas de confirmação e visualizando do 
ponto de Lewis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strutture di conferma e di visualizzazione del 
puntino di Lewis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομές σημείων Lewis επιβεβαίωσης και απεικόνισης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructuras del punto de Lewis que confirman y que
visualizan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">With this activity, students can calculate and visualize the atomic and molecular structures of bonds and lone pairs in the molecule methanol (methyl alcohol, CH3OH).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit dieser Aktivität können Kursteilnehmer die 
Atom- und molekularen Strukturen der Bindungen und der einsamen Paare 
im Molekülmethanol (Methylalkohol, CH3OH) errechnen und sichtbar 
machen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Avec cette activité, les étudiants peuvent 
calculer et visualiser les structures atomiques et moléculaires des 
obligations et des seules paires dans le méthanol de molécule 
(alcool méthylique, CH3OH).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Com esta atividade, os estudantes podem calcular e
visualizar as estruturas atômicas e molecular das ligações e de 
pares solitários no metanol da molécula (álcool methyl, CH3OH).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Con questa attività, gli allievi possono 
calcolare e prevedere le strutture atomiche e molecolari dei legami e 
degli accoppiamenti soli nel metanolo della molecola (alcool metilico,
CH3OH).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με αυτήν την δραστηριότητα, οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να 
υπολογίσουν και να απεικονίσουν τις ατομικές και μοριακές δομές 
των δεσμών και των απομονωμένων ζευγαριών στη μεθανόλη μορίων 
(μεθυλικό οινόπνευμα, CH3OH).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con esta actividad, los estudiantes pueden 
calcular y visualizar las estructuras atómicas y moleculares de 
enlaces y de pares solitarios en el metanol de la molécula (alcohol 
metílico, CH3OH).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BOB GOTWALS
FN:BOB GOTWALS

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108807</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/confirming-and-visualizing-lewis-dot-structures</uri>

  </manifestation>
